translations: n.<美>尿布；重复菱形花纹的棉麻织物；（装饰面上）重复的几何（或花卉）图案
v.<美>给……垫尿布；用重复的几何（或花卉）图案装饰（表面）

sentences.sentence: Currently, disposables account for about 80% to 85% of the $3 billion-plus annual diaper market.
sentences.translation: 目前，一次性尿布占年销售额30多亿美元的尿布市场的80%至85%左右。

sentences.sentence: I tied a string around the diaper box and mailed it.
sentences.translation: 我用绳子捆好尿布箱，然后寄了出去。

sentences.sentence: You want to change your diaper right now so stay still.
sentences.translation: 你现在就想换尿布，所以不要动。
